# Jitterbugs (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Figment Spells|figment]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. +5 ft. 2/levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Save:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 39

You cause the target to perceive itself as being covered in creeping, crawling, stinging bugs. This causes the target to become jittery and unable to stay still, forcing it to constantly move and twitch. The target takes a â€“4 penalty on all Dexterity checks and Dexterity-based skill checks, and cannot take the delay, ready, or total defense actions.
